Class.name: EasyCSP.Validator.Validators.notAlpha
Class.Description:
Pass in a string value, a dynamic array, or a Cache list structure. A true or false (1 or 0) will be returned in a dynamic array (or list) for each value in the input structure. FALSE is returned for each element if that element consists only of the characters [A-Z,a-z]

Method.name: run
Method.Implementation:
attribute = @ME->init(parameters) if attribute->hasErrors() then return attribute
inputValue = attribute->value
if $data(inputValue) = 0 then return attribute if $get(inputValue) = "" then return attribute
if $listValid(inputValue) then inputValue = $listToString(inputValue, @am) end
numberOfValuesToTest = dCount(inputValue, @am) ; * check each value
truth = @true for idx = 1 to numberOfValuesToTest if (inputValue<idx> <> oConv(inputValue<idx>,"MC/A")) then attribute->adderror("Value '" : value : "' must not contain alpha characters; digits and symbols only.") end Next
return attribute
